flavorText: Only when you've given up the search will the caves yield their secrets.

foreignData.flavorText: Erst, wenn du die Suche aufgegeben hast, werden die Höhlen dir ihre Geheimnisse offenbaren.
foreignData.name: Kryptische Höhlen
foreignData.text:
{T}: Erzeuge {C}.
{1}, {T}, opfere die Kryptischen Höhlen: Ziehe eine Karte. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit nur, falls du fünf oder mehr Länder kontrollierst.

foreignData.flavorText: Las cuevas solo compartirán sus secretos cuando hayas abandonado la búsqueda.
foreignData.name: Cuevas crípticas
foreignData.text:
{T}: Agrega {C}.
{1}, {T}, sacrificar las Cuevas crípticas: Roba una carta. Activa esta habilidad solo si controlas cinco o más tierras.

foreignData.flavorText: Ce n'est qu'au moment où vous aurez abandonné vos recherches que les cavernes livreront leurs secrets.
foreignData.name: Cavernes cryptiques
foreignData.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {C}.
{1}, {T}, sacrifiez les Cavernes cryptiques : Piochez une carte. N'activez cette capacité que si vous contrôlez au moins cinq terrains.

foreignData.flavorText: Solo quando avrai smesso di cercare, le caverne riveleranno i propri segreti.
foreignData.name: Caverne Criptiche
foreignData.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifica le Caverne Criptiche: Pesca una carta. Attiva questa abilità solo se controlli cinque o più terre.

foreignData.flavorText: 探索を諦めたときにしか、この洞窟は秘密を明かさない。
foreignData.name: 謎めいた洞窟
foreignData.text:
{T}：{C}を加える。
{1}, {T}, 謎めいた洞窟を生け贄に捧げる：カードを１枚引く。この能力は、あなたが土地を５つ以上コントロールしているときにのみ起動できる。

foreignData.flavorText: As cavernas só lhe revelarão seus segredos quando você tiver desistido da busca.
foreignData.name: Cavernas Crípticas
foreignData.text:
{T}: Adicione {C}.
{1}, {T}, sacrifique Cavernas Crípticas: Compre um card. Ative esta habilidade somente se você controlar cinco ou mais terrenos.

foreignData.flavorText: Лишь когда ты отказываешься от поисков, пещеры раскрывают свои секреты.
foreignData.name: Пещеры Загадок
foreignData.text:
{T}: добавьте {C}.
{1}, {T}, пожертвуйте Пещеры Загадок: возьмите карту. Активируйте эту способность, только если вы контролируете не менее пяти земель.

foreignData.flavorText: 只有在你放弃搜寻时，洞窟才会露出其间的秘密。
foreignData.name: 隐密洞窟
foreignData.text:
{T}：加{C}。
{1}，{T}，牺牲隐密洞窟：抓一张牌。只能于你操控五个或更多地时起动此异能。

name: Cryptic Caves
originalText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Cryptic Caves: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you control five or more lands.

rulings.text: Cryptic Caves can be one of the five lands you control. You don’t need to control five other lands. It’s okay that you’ll only control four lands as you finish activating Cryptic Caves’s last ability.

If you control two Cryptic Caves and exactly three other lands, you can activate the last ability of only one of the Cryptic Caves. As soon as the cost for that ability is paid, you will no longer control enough lands to activate the ability of the second Cryptic Caves.

text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Cryptic Caves: Draw a card. Activate only if you control five or more lands.
